Is India's expenditure on hi-tech areas justified from the social and economic point of view. Elaborate giving reasons.


India's expenditure are justified with the social as well as the economic point of view.India is a developing country so there should be need a growth in the different areas to boost the market. With the help of this India's expenditure will decide in which areas we need to spent. As per the present economy the cost of living is so high due to this India's expenditure is going to be effected.

India is a country were different type of mind set people have different opinion to use there expenditure in different areas. Now a days a common man can incurred his expenses with his limited income of earnings. common man has to think how he wants to spend his expenditure to full fill his basic needs to satisfy his wants and desire. the common man has to think whether he can incurred his expenditure in the hi-tech areas are not. Most of the upper middle class people will spend their expenditure to justify there wants and needs.

For the above reasons the Indian government should do the justification among the people to develop different schemes to provide the general awareness among the people of india. The government should expend the expenditure in those areas where a common man can think to spend his expenditure. For that the indian government should spend their expenditure by building the houses for the poors and should justify with the social and economic point of view.
